cpl.readme:
This plugin adds a top menu. The tiddler [[Top menu|$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/topmenu]] need to be populated with tag based top menu entries. For more information see: http://tw5topmenu.tiddlyspot.com/ <<< ''Note:''
''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/).'' <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]''.
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tg/topmenu
cpl.author: TonGerner
cpl.name: Top menu
title: Plugin_202203244151916
